name: Space Shooter (Sternosaur)
description:
Description:
Space Shooter is a Space Invaders inspired game in which you try to destroy all the incoming enemies before they reach your bases, destroy your bases, or destroy the player.  Destroy the invading aliens to win!

Controls:
Use A and D, or the left arrow and right arrow to move left and right.
Use the left mouse button or the space key to shoot.

Credits:
